title: The Nest
description: Jay McIntyre's main goal in life is to keep his younger siblings together and away from Social Services, who he's certain will separate them if they know his mother left two years ago. Juggling two jobs and the responsibility of caring for three children, the nineteen year old's problems are compounded when Jess, his younger sister, begins to rebel and when an old enemy is released from prison and returns to his housing estate. Overwhelmed and at the end of his rope, Jay is finally forced to seek for help from a surprising Police Constable Brendan Cuddy.
author: G.S. Wiley
